# 1

> 自民党得票率(小選挙区)と獲得議席数の関係

```{r}
df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    balot_jimin = as.numeric(as.character(balot_jimin)),
    n_voter     = as.numeric(as.character(n_voter))
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    p_jimin = balot_jimin / n_balot,
    p_seat_jimin = seat_jimin / seat_total
  )

plot1 <- ggplot(
  df,
  aes(
    x=p_seat_jimin,
    y=p_jimin,
    label=year
  )
)+
geom_point(size = 3) +
geom_smooth(
  method = "lm",
  se = FALSE,
  linewidth = 0.7,
  fullrange = TRUE
) +
geom_text(
  vjust = -1,
  size = 3
) +
  
scale_x_continuous(
    limits = c(0, 1),
    labels = scales::percent
) +
scale_y_continuous(
    limits = c(0, 1),
    labels = scales::percent
) +
  
labs(
  title = "衆院選 自民党得票率(小選挙区)と議席獲得率の関係",
  x = "自民党 議席獲得率（小選挙区）",
  y = "自民党 得票率 (得票数/投票数)",
  caption = "※ データ点が少ないため回帰は参考程度(外挿)"
) +
theme_minimal(base_size = 12)

plot1
```
